source:
%%sql

-- Build SourceSystem_Fact table
-- INSERT OVERWRITE achieves the same as a TRUNCATE TABLE and INSERT INTO but in one statement

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact (
    SourceSystemID,
    Description,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS SourceSystemID,
    "SAP HR" AS Description,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate, 
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo

%%sql

-- Build diversity_dim table
-- INSERT OVERWRITE achieves the same as a TRUNCATE TABLE and INSERT INTO but in one statement

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim (
    DiversityID,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS DiversityID,
    Ethnic_Origin AS Description, 
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
    --COUNT(Ref_NO) AS count
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY Ethnic_Origin;

Select * from odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim

%%sql
-- Build disability_dim table
INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim (
    DisabilityID,
    DisabilityCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS DisabilityID,
    Disability_Text AS DisabilityCode,
    Disability_Code_Description AS Description, 
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, 
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY Disability_Text, Disability_Code_Description;

Select * from odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim

%%sql

-- Build religion_dim table
-- INSERT OVERWRITE achieves the same as a TRUNCATE TABLE and INSERT INTO but in one statement

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim (
    ReligionID,
    ReligionCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS ReligionID,
    Religion AS ReligionCode,
    Religious_Denomination_Key AS Description, 
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY Religion, Religious_Denomination_Key;

Select * from odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim

%%sql

-- Build sxo_dim table
INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim (
    SXOID,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS SXOID,
    SxO AS Description, 
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, 
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY SxO;

Select * from odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim

%%sql
-- Build secureinfo_fact table
INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact (
    SecureInfoID,
    DisabilityID,
    DiversityID,
    ReligionID,
    SXOID,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS SecureInfoID,
    T3.DisabilityID,
    T4.DiversityID,
    T5.ReligionID,
    T6.SXOID, 
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim T3 ON (T1.Disability_Text = T3.DisabilityCode  AND T1.Disability_Code_Description = T3.Description)
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim T4 ON T1.Ethnic_Origin = T4.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim T5 ON (T1.Religion = T5.ReligionCode  AND T1.Religious_Denomination_Key = T5.Description)
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim T6 ON T1.SxO = T6.Description

%%sql
-- Build PersonnelArea_dim table
/**
INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.PersonnelArea_dim (
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelAreaCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS ReligionID,
    -A- AS PersonnelAreaCode,
    -B- AS Description, 
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY -A-, -B-;

Select * from odw_harmonised_db.PersonnelArea_dim 
**/

%%sql
-- Build PersonnelArea_dim table
INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.PersonnelArea_dim (
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelAreaCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS ReligionID,
    Religion AS PersonnelAreaCode,
    Religious_Denomination_Key AS Description, 
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY PersonnelAreaCode, Description;

Select * from odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim
